stories.Title: Bad weather delays ESA's Jupiter mission
stories.Description: Due to lightning risk, the European Space Agency's launch of their groundbreaking “JUICE” mission, which aims to explore the icy moons of Jupiter, has been postponed by a day.
stories.Tweet: Bad weather delays ESA's Jupiter mission 📦 Due to lightning risk, the European Space Agency's launch of their groundbreaking “JUICE” mission, which aims to explore the icy moons of Jupiter, has been postponed by a day. # https://www.space.com/weather-halts-juice-mission-first-launch-attempt

stories.Title: This black hole gets the fullest resolution thanks to AI
stories.Description: New machine-learning technique PRIMO enhances and sharpens M87 black hole image to full resolution, as published by researchers.
stories.Tweet: This black hole gets the fullest resolution thanks to AI 📦 New machine-learning technique PRIMO enhances and sharpens M87 black hole image to full resolution, as published by researchers. # https://www.livescience.com/space/astronomy/black-holes/first-ever-close-up-of-a-supermassive-black-hole-sharpened-to-full-resolution-by-ai-and-the-results-are-stunning

stories.Title: Amazon unveils Bedrock
stories.Description: Developers will now have access to artificial intelligence systems which can generate text to enhance their software as the company plans to keep up with the competition.
stories.Tweet: Amazon unveils Bedrock 📦 Developers will now have access to artificial intelligence systems which can generate text to enhance their software as the company plans to keep up with the competition. # https://www.cnbc.com/2023/04/13/aws-launches-bedrock-generative-ai-service-titan-llms.html

stories.Title: Apple's latest sustainability goals
stories.Description: By 2025, the company plans to use 100% recycled cobalt in batteries as part of a larger effort towards renewable materials and carbon neutrality.
stories.Tweet: Apple's latest sustainability goals 📦 By 2025, the company plans to use 100% recycled cobalt in batteries as part of a larger effort towards renewable materials and carbon neutrality. # https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2023/04/apple-will-use-100-percent-recycled-cobalt-in-batteries-by-2025/

stories.Title: India could build your new iPhone
stories.Description: It appears India may become Apple's main iPhone supplier as the company strives to reduce its dependence on China.
stories.Tweet: India could build your new iPhone 📦 It appears India may become Apple's main iPhone supplier as the company strives to reduce its dependence on China. # https://9to5mac.com/2023/04/13/made-in-india-iphones/

stories.Title: Intel and Arm join forces
stories.Description: It looks like chip design is heading for a bright future as Intel Foundry Services and ARM are partnering to design next-generation chips based on Intel's 18A process and ARM's technology.
stories.Tweet: Intel and Arm join forces 📦 It looks like chip design is heading for a bright future as Intel Foundry Services and ARM are partnering to design next-generation chips based on Intel's 18A process and ARM's technology. # https://www.techradar.com/news/a-new-arm-deal-means-your-next-mobile-device-could-use-a-next-gen-intel-soc

stories.Title: GitHub Accelerator's first cohort
stories.Description: Starting in winter 2023, the selected projects will receive a $20K sponsorship and guidance from open source leaders through the company's 10-week program.
stories.Tweet: GitHub Accelerator's first cohort 📦 Starting in winter 2023, the selected projects will receive a $20K sponsorship and guidance from open source leaders through the company's 10-week program. # https://github.blog/2023-04-12-github-accelerator-our-first-cohort-and-whats-next/

stories.Title: CodeWhisperer is now generally available
stories.Description: With Amazon's free AI coding companion, developers can now write code quickly and securely without needing to break their flow.
stories.Tweet: CodeWhisperer is now generally available 📦 With Amazon's free AI coding companion, developers can now write code quickly and securely without needing to break their flow. # https://aws.amazon.com/es/blogs/aws/amazon-codewhisperer-free-for-individual-use-is-now-generally-available/

stories.Title: HyperWrite reveals an AI agent that “surfs” the web
stories.Description: Through a Google Chrome extension, this new experimental agent revolutionizes web browsing by interacting with websites like a human.
stories.Tweet: HyperWrite reveals an AI agent that “surfs” the web 📦 Through a Google Chrome extension, this new experimental agent revolutionizes web browsing by interacting with websites like a human. # https://venturebeat.com/ai/hyperwrite-unveils-breakthrough-ai-agent-that-can-surf-the-web-like-a-human/

stories.Title: What's happening with the iPhone 15?
stories.Description: It seems Apple keeps dispelling rumors regarding the new iPhone, which might not include solid-state buttons as expected.
stories.Tweet: What's happening with the iPhone 15? 📦 It seems Apple keeps dispelling rumors regarding the new iPhone, which might not include solid-state buttons as expected. # https://gizmodo.com/apple-iphone-15-taptic-touch-buttons-kuo-leak-stocks-1850329674

stories.Title: Twitter will get real-time stock and crypto information
stories.Description: Following Musk's plan to become the world's largest financial institution, the app has partnered with the investment platform eToro.
stories.Tweet: Twitter will get real-time stock and crypto information 📦 Following Musk's plan to become the world's largest financial institution, the app has partnered with the investment platform eToro. # https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/13/twitter-partners-with-etoro-to-show-real-time-stock-and-crypto-information/
